Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintingcanvas.drawable.Drawable<Polygon>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animatable
    public class Polygon
extends Drawable<Polygon>
    A Polygon Element. 
    
 Polygon polygon = new Polygon(100, 100,
     new int[] {0, 25, 50},
     new int[] {50, 25, 0},
 );

               int y)

                     .point(0, 50)
                     .point(25, 25)
                     .point(50, 0)
